text.name: sys_description
text.text: This collection includes all the 4 player games in your library, all systems combined and listed in alphabetical order. It's perfect for when you have a group of buddies and want to get some 4-way retro-gaming action. Includes all the action, racing, platforming, beat'em up, fighting, etc. games that feature a 4 player multiplayer mode. Bomberman, Micro Machines, NBA Jam, Crash Team Racing, TMNT Turtles in Time, Gauntlet, D&D Tower of Doom, Golden Axe, etc. All the usual sorting filters are available.
